NAME: Card Name
DESCRIPTION: Card Description

NAME: Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.

NAME: Defend
DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block.

NAME: Magic Missile
DESCRIPTION: astray:Spell , astray:Enlighten NL Deal !D! damage.

astray:Derive_Spell, astray:Enlighten NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! astray:Ember and !astray:extras! astray:Frost.

NAME: Magic Release
DESCRIPTION: astray:Enlighten NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have at least 2 astray:Mana, gain !M! astray:Magic and Exhaust this card.
UPGRADED_DESC: astray:Enlighten NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have at least 2 astray:Mana, gain !M! astray:Magic. NL If you have less than 4 *Mana, Exhaust this card.
astray:Enlighten NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you have at least 3 astray:Mana, gain !M! astray:Magic and Exhaust this card. You can no longer gain *Magic this combat.

NAME: Mist
DESCRIPTION: astray:Storage NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
UPGRADED_DESC: astray:Storage NL ALL enemies gain !M! Weak and lose !astray:extras! Strength. NL Exhaust.

NAME: Mana Shield
DESCRIPTION: astray:Spell NL Gain !B! Block . NL Gain !M! additional Block for each Mana you have.

NAME: Prepare Spells

UPGRADED_DESC: astray:Storage，astray:Enlighten NL Draw !M! cards and gain 1 astray:Mana. Put 1 unexhausted Spell card on the top of draw pile.
astray:Enlighten NL Gain 1 astray:Mana. NL Put 1 unexhausted Spell card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
MSG: Put %d card on the top of draw pile.

NAME: Vary Tactic
DESCRIPTION: astray:Enlighten NL Choose a card. NL Discard all cards of same kind, draw that many cards. NL Exhaust .
UPGRADED_DESC: astray:Enlighten NL Choose a card. NL Discard any cards，draw that many cards but no more than !M! . NL 消耗 。
astray:Enlighten NL Choose a card. NL Discard all cards of same kind, then draw that many cards.

NAME: Tactical Change
DESCRIPTION: astray:Enlighten NL Discard ALL astray:Spell cards from hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
UPGRADED_DESC: astray:Enlighten NL Discard any number of cards in hand. NL Draw that many cards but no more than !M!. NL Exhaust.
astray:Enlighten NL Discard ALL non-astray:Spell cards from hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.

NAME: Unity

NAME: Imbalance

NAME: Mastery

NAME: Ignorance

NAME: Magic Body
